divs: sighting detailson the evening of 9\3\08 at approximately 7:15pm as i was watching the republican convention is when my daughter came running in and said that while she was reading in her room she something ���weird��� out side of her window. i though she might have seen a bird or stray cat or even a plane (we live in a flight path for john wayne airport) but then she said that it had several lights on it, at which time i asked her was she sure it was not a plane and she said the following��� ���i was looking out the window when i saw this. (see her attached drawing) it was not a plane, helicopter, or blimp. it flew, but was not shaped properly. it passed through the air, past our house.��� i then made sure to asked her as to the exactly how she saw the object i by what she told me that object was traveling slowly at tree top level (actual distance from her she could not determine) in a northerly direction (her bedroom window faces due east) toward the 22-freeway and a mall at which time she came in an told me about it. when i got into her room the object was gone.
